buckshot.name: Buckshot
buckshot.desc: Apply 1 **Wound** to a random enemy at the beginning of your turn.
buckshot.flavour: *'Reloads quickly and fits right in your pocket. Just don't bother aiming.'*

boosted_buckshot.name: Boosted Buckshot
boosted_buckshot.desc: Apply 2 **Wound** to a random enemy at the beginning of your turn.
boosted_buckshot.flavour: *'Reloads quickly and fits right in your pocket. Just don't bother aiming.'*

absorber.name: Absorber
absorber.desc: Whenever you play 4 Diplomacy cards in a row, apply 1 **Composure** to all friendly arguments.
absorber.flavour: *'Consistency is key. The same pathways used over and over help this thing really sing.'*

swift_absorber.name: Swift Absorber
swift_absorber.desc: Whenever you play 3 Diplomacy cards in a row, apply 1 **Composure** to all friendly arguments.
swift_absorber.flavour: *'Consistency is key. The same pathways used over and over help this thing really sing.'*

afterburner_gloves.name: Afterburner Gloves
afterburner_gloves.flavour: *'The heat is on with these stylish and dangerous gloves, be sure to make sure that your district's incendiary regulation allows for the handling and ownership of these items.'*

aleternator.name: Aleternator
aleternator.desc: Whenever you draw an Empty Bottle, gain 2 **Defense**.
aleternator.flavour: *'A severe increase to your metabolism, keeps you tough and lasts longer.'*

soothing_aleternator.name: Soothing Aleternator
soothing_aleternator.desc: Whenever you draw an Empty Bottle, gain 2 **Defense** and **Alleviate** 1.
soothing_aleternator.flavour: *'A severe increase to your metabolism, keeps you tough and lasts longer.'*

annihilation_cage.name: Annihilation Cage
annihilation_cage.desc: At the end of every turn, choose any number of cards in your hand to gain **Sticky** for this battle.

arc_loader.name: Arc Loader
arc_loader.flavour: *'Cycling the guns up to maximum still creates energy that we can use for other things.'*

boosted_arc_loader.name: Boosted Arc Loader
boosted_arc_loader.flavour: *'Cycling the guns up to maximum still creates energy that we can use for other things.'*

armor_plating.name: Armor Plating
armor_plating.flavour: *'Small lumin fields are generated by gun cycling and this here makes sure to localize them onto your person.'*

stone_armor_plating.name: Stone Armor Plating
stone_armor_plating.flavour: *'Small lumin fields are generated by gun cycling and this here makes sure to localize them onto your person.'*

arterial_scanner.name: Arterial Scanner
arterial_scanner.desc: **Bleed** decays 33% at the end of the turn instead of 50%.
arterial_scanner.flavour: *'What do you mean there's been a software update? Did people's veins move around or something?'*

boosted_arterial_scanner.name: Boosted Arterial Scanner
boosted_arterial_scanner.desc: **Bleed** decays 20% at the end of the turn instead of 50%.
boosted_arterial_scanner.flavour: *'What do you mean there's been a software update? Did people's veins move around or something?'*

auto_sorter.name: Auto Sorter
auto_sorter.desc: At the start of your turn, automatically discard up to 3 Empty Bottle cards and draw that many cards.
auto_sorter.flavour: *'This is perfect! My life is such a mess right now.'*

visionary_auto_sorter.name: Visionary Auto Sorter
visionary_auto_sorter.desc: At the start of your turn, automatically discard all Empty Bottle cards and draw that many cards.
visionary_auto_sorter.flavour: *'This is perfect! My life is such a mess right now.'*

auto_tracker.name: Auto Tracker
auto_tracker.desc: At the start of each turn, apply 2 Mark to a random enemy.

boosted_auto_tracker.name: Boosted Auto Tracker
boosted_auto_tracker.desc: At the start of each turn, apply 3 Mark to a random enemy.

bandit.name: Bandit
bandit.desc: Whenever you trigger a card's **Threshold**, gain 2 Adrenaline.
bandit.flavour: *'Feel that rush? Might as well use it.'*

boosted_bandit.name: Boosted Bandit
boosted_bandit.desc: Whenever you trigger a card's **Threshold**, gain 3 Adrenaline.
boosted_bandit.flavour: *'Feel that rush? Might as well use it.'*

battle_stein.name: Battle Stein
battle_stein.desc: Whenever you Drink more than 5 times in a turn, gain 3 Adrenaline.

boosted_battle_stein.name: Boosted Battle Stein
boosted_battle_stein.desc: Whenever you Drink more than 5 times in a turn, gain 5 Adrenaline.

best_offense.name: Best Offense
best_offense.desc: Whenever you spend all your combo, gain 5 **Defense**.

stone_best_offense.name: Stone Best Offense
stone_best_offense.desc: Whenever you spend all your combo, gain 8 **Defense**.

blast_chamber.name: Blast Chamber
blast_chamber.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn.
blast_chamber.flavour: *'Lot 42 is a very strong and very stable Spark battery! No leakage or exploding here folks, built by master craftsmen with the finest of materials.'*

bloody_mess.name: Bloody Mess
bloody_mess.desc: At the start of your turn, apply 1 **Bleed** to all enemies.
bloody_mess.flavour: *'There isn't a lot of elegance that goes into making one of these. It's also frowned on in pretty much every circle.'*

savage_bloody_mess.name: Savage Bloody Mess
savage_bloody_mess.desc: At the start of your turn, apply 2 **Bleed** to all enemies.
savage_bloody_mess.flavour: *'There isn't a lot of elegance that goes into making one of these. It's also frowned on in pretty much every circle.'*

body_piercing.name: Body Piercing
body_piercing.desc: At the end of every turn, gain 1 Counter for every 3 **Defense** you have.
body_piercing.flavour: *'Good luck getting a job there pal.*

thorny_body_piercing.name: Thorny Body Piercing
thorny_body_piercing.desc: At the end of every turn, gain 2 Counter for every 3 **Defense** you have.
thorny_body_piercing.flavour: *'Good luck getting a job there pal.*

booster_clamp.name: Booster Clamp
booster_clamp.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. Enemies no longer Panic.
booster_clamp.flavour: *'Kind of leaves your empathy in shambles. Makes room for fighting I guess.'*

visionary_booster_clamp.name: Visionary Booster Clamp
visionary_booster_clamp.desc: Gain 1 action and draw 1 card at the start of your turn. Enemies no longer Panic.
visionary_booster_clamp.flavour: *'Kind of leaves your empathy in shambles. Makes room for fighting I guess.'*

bottle_shot.name: Bottle Shot
bottle_shot.desc: All attacks deal 2 bonus damage if you have spent a bottle with another card this turn.

boosted_bottle_shot.name: Boosted Bottle Shot
boosted_bottle_shot.desc: All attacks deal 3 bonus damage if you have spent a bottle with another card this turn.

bottom_edge.name: Bottom Edge
bottom_edge.desc: All attacks gain +1 to minimum damage, up to their maximum damage.

boosted_bottom_edge.name: Boosted Bottom Edge
boosted_bottom_edge.desc: All attacks gain +2 to minimum damage, up to their maximum damage.

brain_barrage.name: Brain Barrage
brain_barrage.desc: Whenever you play 3 Manipulate cards in a row, deal 4 damage to a random opponent argument.
brain_barrage.flavour: *'This here will make quick work out of anyone that steps up.'*

boosted_brain_barrage.name: Boosted Brain Barrage
boosted_brain_barrage.desc: Whenever you play 3 Manipulate cards in a row, deal 6 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_brain_barrage.flavour: *'This here will make quick work out of anyone that steps up.'*

brain_harp.name: Brain Harp
brain_harp.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn, damage that spills over to your core is increased by 2.
brain_harp.flavour: *'You’re going to have to get used to that humming.'*

visionary_brain_harp.name: Visionary Brain Harp
visionary_brain_harp.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn, damage that spills over to your core is increased by 2.
visionary_brain_harp.flavour: *'You’re going to have to get used to that humming.'*

brain_spur.name: Brain Spur
brain_spur.desc: Your first card played every turn also damages an additional random opponent argument.
brain_spur.flavour: *'Brain Spurs are frowned upon in some communities because of the biting aggression that comes with the concentration boost.'*

wide_brain_spur.name: Wide Brain Spur
wide_brain_spur.desc: Your first card played every turn also damages 2 additional random opponent arguments.
wide_brain_spur.flavour: *'Brain Spurs are frowned upon in some communities because of the biting aggression that comes with the concentration boost.'*

burnt_out_graft_battle.name: Burnt-out Graft
burnt_out_graft_battle.desc: You draw one less card every round.
burnt_out_graft_battle.flavour: *'Ugh, who put this in you? Have a little respect for yourself.'*

burnt_out_graft_negotiation.name: Burnt-out Graft
burnt_out_graft_negotiation.desc: You draw one less card every round.
burnt_out_graft_negotiation.flavour: *'Ugh, who put this in you? Have a little respect for yourself.'*

buster.name: Buster
buster.desc: Whenever you break **Defense** with an attack, apply 2 **Bleed** and gain 4 **Defense**.
buster.flavour: *'The designer was just sick to death of not being able to get through those armored bandits.'*

savage_buster.name: Savage Buster
savage_buster.desc: Whenever you break **Defense** with an attack, apply 4 **Bleed** and gain 4 **Defense**.
savage_buster.flavour: *'The designer was just sick to death of not being able to get through those armored bandits.'*

calamity_jar.name: Calamity Jar
calamity_jar.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. You can no longer own a pet.
calamity_jar.flavour: *'Animals just can’t handle the noise. I actually kind of like it.'*

visionary_calamity_jar.name: Visionary Calamity Jar
visionary_calamity_jar.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. You can no longer own a pet.
visionary_calamity_jar.flavour: *'Animals just can’t handle the noise. I actually kind of like it.'*

calcifier.name: Calcifier
calcifier.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to any Adrenaline you have.
calcifier.flavour: *'I don’t know if your physiology can take much more experimentation, but it’s your money.'*

boosted_calcifier.name: Boosted Calcifier
boosted_calcifier.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to any Adrenaline you have + 2.
boosted_calcifier.flavour: *'I don’t know if your physiology can take much more experimentation, but it’s your money.'*

cerebral_stimulants.name: Cerebral Stimulants
cerebral_stimulants.desc: Draw one extra card per turn.
cerebral_stimulants.flavour: *'Oh yeah, I can feel them for sure. How much sleep am I supposed to be losing?'*

visionary_cerebral_stimulants.name: Visionary Cerebral Stimulants
visionary_cerebral_stimulants.flavour: *'Oh yeah, I can feel them for sure. How much sleep am I supposed to be losing?'*

cerebral_tackle.name: Cerebral Tackle
cerebral_tackle.desc: Whenever any argument is removed or destroyed, apply 2 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.

stone_cerebral_tackle.name: Stone Cerebral Tackle
stone_cerebral_tackle.desc: Whenever any argument is removed or destroyed, apply 3 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.

chafe.name: Chafe
chafe.desc: At the start of your turn, take 1 piercing damage.

boosted_chafe.name: Boosted Chafe
boosted_chafe.desc: At the start of your turn, take 1 piercing damage and increase your Moxie by 1.

chemical_regulator.name: Chemical Regulator
chemical_regulator.desc: When installed, upgrade 3 random negotiation cards.
chemical_regulator.flavour: *'I’m not saying that the initial readout is that bad, but everyone could probably use help with this.'*

boosted_chemical_regulator.name: Boosted Chemical Regulator
boosted_chemical_regulator.desc: When upgraded, upgrade 3 additional negotiation cards.
boosted_chemical_regulator.flavour: *'I’m not saying that the initial readout is that bad, but everyone could probably use help with this.'*

clan_chain.name: Clan Chain
clan_chain.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Renown
clan_chain.flavour: *'I pity the fool who doesn’t own a necklace as fine as this.'*

boosted_clan_chain.name: Boosted Clan Chain
boosted_clan_chain.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Renown
boosted_clan_chain.flavour: *'I pity the fool who doesn’t own a necklace as fine as this.'*

clan_ring.name: Clan Ring
clan_ring.desc: Whenever you gain Renown, apply 1 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.
clan_ring.flavour: *'Wait a minute, where did you get that?'*

stone_clan_ring.name: Stone Clan Ring
stone_clan_ring.desc: Whenever you gain Renown, apply 2 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.
stone_clan_ring.flavour: *'Wait a minute, where did you get that?'*

clicker.name: Clicker
clicker.desc: Whenever you spend your last **Charge**, draw a card.
clicker.flavour: *'When I can’t find mine it’s usually between the cushions.'*

visionary_clicker.name: Visionary Clicker
visionary_clicker.desc: Whenever you spend your last **Charge**, draw 2 cards.
visionary_clicker.flavour: *'When I can’t find mine it’s usually between the cushions.'*

cloister.name: Cloister
cloister.desc: Deal 2 bonus damage while you have any **Defense**.
cloister.flavour: *'There's an even better reason to keep your guard up with this. Those spark fuses should last a while.'*

boosted_cloister.name: Boosted Cloister
boosted_cloister.desc: Deal 3 bonus damage while you have any **Defense**.
boosted_cloister.flavour: *'There's an even better reason to keep your guard up with this. Those spark fuses should last a while.'*

clot_hammer.name: Clot Hammer
clot_hammer.flavour: *'Remember to keep the chamber clean. These things are finicky.'*

stone_clot_hammer.name: Stone Clot Hammer
stone_clot_hammer.flavour: *'Remember to keep the chamber clean. These things are finicky.'*

cludger.name: Cludger
cludger.desc: At the start of your turn, steal up to 4 **Composure** from a random opponent argument.
cludger.flavour: *'Mainly dealing with high frequency brain waves, the Cludger can literally drain away one’s confidence.'*

stone_cludger.name: Stone Cludger
stone_cludger.desc: At the start of your turn, steal up to 6 **Composure** from a random opponent argument.
stone_cludger.flavour: *'Mainly dealing with high frequency brain waves, the Cludger can literally drain away one’s confidence.'*

coactive_orbslug.name: Coactive Orbslug
coactive_orbslug.desc: Whenever you gain Influence, deal 2 damage to a random opponent argument.
coactive_orbslug.flavour: *'Sure about this? If I ever have to remove it you’re probably going to forget a few birthdays.'*

boosted_coactive_orbslug.name: Boosted Coactive Orbslug
boosted_coactive_orbslug.desc: Whenever you gain Influence, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_coactive_orbslug.flavour: *'Sure about this? If I ever have to remove it you’re probably going to forget a few birthdays.'*

collapsing_defeat.name: Collapsing Defeat
collapsing_defeat.desc: Whenever you fully mitigate damage, **Incept** 1 Doubt.

collateralator.name: Collateralator
collateralator.desc: Empty Bottle cards deal 1 damage to a random enemy target when played, but also gain **Restrained**.
collateralator.flavour: *'This simple mechanical catch and sling can hurl those spare bottles for you.'*

boosted_collateralator.name: Boosted Collateralator
boosted_collateralator.desc: Empty Bottle cards deal 2 damage to a random enemy target when played, but also gain **Restrained**.
boosted_collateralator.flavour: *'This simple mechanical catch and sling can hurl those spare bottles for you.'*

company_band.name: Company Band
company_band.flavour: *'First class trainers get these bracelets and the animals seem to take note.'*

boosted_company_band.name: Boosted Company Band
boosted_company_band.flavour: *'First class trainers get these bracelets and the animals seem to take note.'*

contractor.name: Contractor
contractor.desc: Whenever you gain Dominance, deal 1 damage to all opponent arguments.

boosted_contractor.name: Boosted Contractor
boosted_contractor.desc: Whenever you gain Dominance, deal 2 damage to all targets.

counter_band.name: Counter Band
counter_band.desc: Whenever you prevent all damage from an attack, gain 2 Combo.
counter_band.flavour: *'That's about as reinforced as I can make it while keeping the weight down.'*

rival's_counter_band.name: Rival's Counter Band
rival's_counter_band.desc: Whenever you prevent all damage from an attack, gain 3 Combo.
rival's_counter_band.flavour: *'That's about as reinforced as I can make it while keeping the weight down.'*

cranial_coolant.name: Cranial Coolant
cranial_coolant.desc: Diplomacy cards deal 2 bonus damage while you have 5 Renown or more.
cranial_coolant.flavour: *'Always good to keep a cool head during these discussions.'*

boosted_cranial_coolant.name: Boosted Cranial Coolant
boosted_cranial_coolant.desc: Diplomacy cards deal 3 bonus damage while you have 5 Renown or more.
boosted_cranial_coolant.flavour: *'Always good to keep a cool head during these discussions.'*

cranial_patch.name: Cranial Patch
cranial_patch.flavour: *'Yeah there’s some damage there. This will fix it and keep your eyes on the prize.'*

stone_cranial_patch.name: Stone Cranial Patch
stone_cranial_patch.desc: Every time you **Prepare** a card, **Gamble** and gain 2 **Composure**.
stone_cranial_patch.flavour: *'Yeah there’s some damage there. This will fix it and keep your eyes on the prize.'*

critical_expanse.name: Critical Expanse
critical_expanse.desc: At the start of each turn, draw one extra card for each card in your hand at the end of last turn.

critical_pump.name: Critical Pump
critical_pump.desc: While your Moxie is at or below 3, all your attacks deal 2 bonus damage.
critical_pump.flavour: *'Your guts want to fix themselves all the time, when they aren’t worried about that you can get some more blood into those arms of yours.'*

boosted_critical_pump.name: Boosted Critical Pump
boosted_critical_pump.desc: While your Moxie is at or below 3, all your attacks deal 3 bonus damage.
boosted_critical_pump.flavour: *'Your guts want to fix themselves all the time, when they aren’t worried about that you can get some more blood into those arms of yours.'*

dangerous_bulb.name: Dangerous Bulb
dangerous_bulb.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. Take 3 damage at the end of every turn.
dangerous_bulb.flavour: *'No returns, it’s right in the name for Hesh’s sake.'*

visionary_dangerous_bulb.name: Visionary Dangerous Bulb
visionary_dangerous_bulb.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. Take 3 damage at the end of every turn.
visionary_dangerous_bulb.flavour: *'No returns, it’s right in the name for Hesh’s sake.'*

dermal_cast.name: Dermal Cast
dermal_cast.desc: At the start of your turn, **Heal** 2 health.
dermal_cast.flavour: *'This rare graft rejuvenates the body and mind! Well the body for sure...'*

despair_cables.name: Despair Cables
despair_cables.desc: Whenever you fully defend an attack, increase the attacker's panic by 2.

disruptive_glanworm.name: Disruptive Glanworm
disruptive_glanworm.flavour: *'There’s a growing group of people that believe that the glanworms make you a lot more disagreeable when under stress.'*

assertive_glanworm.name: Assertive Glanworm
assertive_glanworm.flavour: *'There’s a growing group of people that believe that the glanworms make you a lot more disagreeable when under stress.'*

distresser.name: Distresser
distresser.desc: Vulnerability is twice as effective against your opponent.
distresser.flavour: *'Ugh, I hate these things, easiest way to clear a room.'*

boosted_distresser.name: Boosted Distresser
boosted_distresser.desc: Vulnerability is three times as effective against your opponent.
boosted_distresser.flavour: *'Ugh, I hate these things, easiest way to clear a room.'*

distributed_processing.name: Distributed Processing
distributed_processing.desc: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw a card.
distributed_processing.flavour: *'All your baggage, this thing will take care of it. Or at least leave it organized.'*

boosted_distributed_processing.name: Boosted Distributed Processing
boosted_distributed_processing.desc:
Whenever you draw a Status card, draw a card.
50% chance to **Expend** the Status card.
boosted_distributed_processing.flavour: *'All your baggage, this thing will take care of it. Or at least leave it organized.'*

dynamic_reset.name: Dynamic Reset
dynamic_reset.desc: At the start of each turn, discard any number of cards and draw that many new cards.

dynamo.name: Dynamo
dynamo.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, gain 1 **Power**.
dynamo.flavour: *'It winds off raw adrenaline and takes a bit to get going.'*

boosted_dynamo.name: Boosted Dynamo
boosted_dynamo.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, gain 1 **Power** and 1 Adrenaline.
boosted_dynamo.flavour: *'It winds off raw adrenaline and takes a bit to get going.'*

easy_listening.name: Easy Listening
easy_listening.desc: At the start of battle, gain 3 Concentration.
easy_listening.flavour: *'The audio manages to bring the listener to a more focused state with a combination of wilderness sounds and inoffensive music.'*

boosted_easy_listening.name: Boosted Easy Listening
boosted_easy_listening.desc: At the start of battle, gain 5 Concentration.
boosted_easy_listening.flavour: *'The audio manages to bring the listener to a more focused state with a combination of wilderness sounds and inoffensive music.'*

ego_pump.name: Ego Pump
ego_pump.desc: Whenever your Renown is removed or destroyed, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
ego_pump.flavour: *'The ringing in your ears? Yeah that’s permanent.'*

boosted_ego_pump.name: Boosted Ego Pump
boosted_ego_pump.desc: Whenever your Renown is removed or destroyed, deal 4 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_ego_pump.flavour: *'The ringing in your ears? Yeah that’s permanent.'*

ether_hook.name: Ether Hook
ether_hook.desc: At the start of each battle, **Improvise+** a random **Ability** card, it costs 0 until played.

fatigue_spring.name: Fatigue Spring
fatigue_spring.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 4 **Defense** if you have **Wound** or **Impair**.
fatigue_spring.flavour: *'You lose about 3 hours worth of good sleep, but the payoff is well worth it.'*

stone_fatigue_spring.name: Stone Fatigue Spring
stone_fatigue_spring.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 6 **Defense** if you have **Wound** or **Impair**.
stone_fatigue_spring.flavour: *'You lose about 3 hours worth of good sleep, but the payoff is well worth it.'*

feedback_loop.name: Feedback Loop
feedback_loop.desc: Your first attack each battle does x2 damage.
feedback_loop.flavour: *'Burns itself out right away but it just wrecks house.'*

boosted_feedback_loop.name: Boosted Feedback Loop
boosted_feedback_loop.desc: Your first attack each battle does x3 damage.
boosted_feedback_loop.flavour: *'Burns itself out right away but it just wrecks house.'*

finely_crafted_amulet.name: Finely Crafted Amulet
finely_crafted_amulet.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. At the start of your turn remove 1 Renown.
finely_crafted_amulet.flavour: *'All custom carved gemstones. Nope, this one is not for sale'*

visionary_finely_crafted_amulet.name: Visionary Finely Crafted Amulet
visionary_finely_crafted_amulet.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. At the start of your turn remove 1 Renown.
visionary_finely_crafted_amulet.flavour: *'All custom carved gemstones. Nope, this one is not for sale'*

first_blood.name: First Blood
first_blood.desc: Your first attack each battle deals an extra 4 **Bleed**.
first_blood.flavour: *'Spring loaded blades are commonly used by the more dishonorable street fighters.'*

boosted_first_blood.name: Boosted First Blood
boosted_first_blood.desc: Your first attack each battle deals an extra 6 **Bleed**.
boosted_first_blood.flavour: *'Spring loaded blades are commonly used by the more dishonorable street fighters.'*

flash_powder.name: Flash Powder
flash_powder.desc: Your first attack each battle applies 2 Scorched.
flash_powder.flavour: *'I couldn’t figure out anything to use this stuff for except starting violent fires.'*

boosted_flash_powder.name: Boosted Flash Powder
boosted_flash_powder.desc: Your first attack each battle applies 4 Scorched.
boosted_flash_powder.flavour: *'I couldn’t figure out anything to use this stuff for except starting violent fires.'*

flawless_casualty.name: Flawless Casualty
flawless_casualty.desc: While you have no arguments, all your cards deal double damage.

fleximator.name: Fleximator
fleximator.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to half of your Recoverable Health.
fleximator.flavour: *'I’m still trying to figure out your healing variable but this should at least cauterize your injuries a little faster.'*

boosted_fleximator.name: Boosted Fleximator
boosted_fleximator.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to 75% of your Recoverable Health.
boosted_fleximator.flavour: *'I’m still trying to figure out your healing variable but this should at least cauterize your injuries a little faster.'*

flint_tips.name: Flint Tips
flint_tips.desc: All attacks deal 1 bonus damage per stack of Scorched on the target.
flint_tips.flavour: *'I’ll do the whole box, no extra charge.'*

boosted_flint_tips.name: Boosted Flint Tips
boosted_flint_tips.desc: All attacks deal 2 bonus damage per stack of Scorched on the target.
boosted_flint_tips.flavour: *'I’ll do the whole box, no extra charge.'*

force_compression.name: Force Compression
force_compression.desc: All cards that cost more than 1 action cost 1 action instead.

forecaster.name: Forecaster
forecaster.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 4 **Defense** if you have any Concentration.
forecaster.flavour: *'It’s actually a pretty simple targeting computer that has a predictive algorithm.'*

stone_forecaster.name: Stone Forecaster
stone_forecaster.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 6 **Defense** if you have any Concentration.
stone_forecaster.flavour: *'It’s actually a pretty simple targeting computer that has a predictive algorithm.'*

fragmenter.name: Fragmenter
fragmenter.desc: Whenever you discard a card, apply 1 **Wound** to a random enemy.
fragmenter.flavour: *'Basic explosives usually found in the more colorful areas of Havaria. Very illegal.'*

deep_fragmenter.name: Deep Fragmenter
deep_fragmenter.desc: Whenever you discard a card, apply 1 **Wound** and 1 **Impair** to a random enemy.
deep_fragmenter.flavour: *'Basic explosives usually found in the more colorful areas of Havaria. Very illegal.'*

frontal_goad.name: Frontal Goad
frontal_goad.desc: All friendly arguments come into play with 2 bonus resolve.
frontal_goad.flavour: *'Frontal goads used to be Admiralty guard standard before the market collapse.'*

boosted_frontal_goad.name: Boosted Frontal Goad
boosted_frontal_goad.desc: All friendly arguments come into play with 3 bonus resolve.
boosted_frontal_goad.flavour: *'Frontal goads used to be Admiralty guard standard before the market collapse.'*

fumes.name: Fumes
fumes.desc: While you have no charge, all your attacks deal 2 bonus damage.
fumes.flavour: *'There’s a large energy vacuum in some of the internal tubes that you can use to bolster the stopping power of regular shots.'*

boosted_fumes.name: Boosted Fumes
boosted_fumes.desc: While you have no charge, all your attacks deal 3 bonus damage.
boosted_fumes.flavour: *'There’s a large energy vacuum in some of the internal tubes that you can use to bolster the stopping power of regular shots.'*

fused_collider.name: Fused Collider
fused_collider.desc: All cards have a random cost between 0 and 2 and change cost when played or at the end of your turn.

gang_pendant.name: Gang Pendant
gang_pendant.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 3 Renown
gang_pendant.flavour: *'Of course I know what that means, I just wanted to see if you did.'*

boosted_gang_pendant.name: Boosted Gang Pendant
boosted_gang_pendant.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 5 Renown
boosted_gang_pendant.flavour: *'Of course I know what that means, I just wanted to see if you did.'*

glancer.name: Glancer
glancer.desc: At the start of each turn, apply 1 Ricochet to a random target.
glancer.flavour: *'An old Aerostat favorite. Always makes the firefights a little more chaotic.'*

boosted_glancer.name: Boosted Glancer
boosted_glancer.desc: At the start of each turn, apply 2 Ricochet to a random target.
boosted_glancer.flavour: *'An old Aerostat favorite. Always makes the firefights a little more chaotic.'*

hammerthyst_ring.name: Hammerthyst Ring
hammerthyst_ring.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 2 **Defense** for every card in your hand.
hammerthyst_ring.flavour: *'One of the smallest spark generators is set inside this obsidian casing. Fits on the finger but makes a huge impression!'*

hangunder.name: Hangunder
hangunder.desc: Whenever you play a Slurred Speech card, restore 3 resolve.
hangunder.flavour: *'Here, take this. Don’t ask what’s in it.'*

fancy_hangunder.name: Fancy Hangunder
fancy_hangunder.desc:
Whenever you play a Slurred Speech card, restore 3 resolve.
Slurred Speech cards cost 1 less.
fancy_hangunder.flavour: *'Here, take this. Don’t ask what’s in it.'*

heartless.name: Heartless
heartless.desc: If you are under 30% health, all attacks inflict 2 **Wound**.
heartless.flavour: *'It's named after how you leave your opponent.'*

deep_heartless.name: Deep Heartless
deep_heartless.desc: If you are under 30% health, all attacks inflict 3 **Wound**.
deep_heartless.flavour: *'It's named after how you leave your opponent.'*

heirloom_knucks.name: Heirloom Knucks
heirloom_knucks.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn, your maximum hand size is reduced by 3.

visionary_heirloom_knucks.name: Visionary Heirloom Knucks
visionary_heirloom_knucks.desc: Gain 1 action and draw 1 card at the start of your turn, your maximum hand size is reduced by 3.

hemophage.name: Hemophage
hemophage.flavour: *'It's best not to think about it. The mechanisms involved are downright gruesome.'*

leeching_hemophage.name: Leeching Hemophage
leeching_hemophage.flavour: *'It's best not to think about it. The mechanisms involved are downright gruesome.'*

high_pitched_whine.name: High Pitched Whine
high_pitched_whine.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 1 Whine.
high_pitched_whine.flavour: *'Eventually it’s the only thing they can focus on.'*

boosted_high_pitched_whine.name: Boosted High Pitched Whine
boosted_high_pitched_whine.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 2 Whine.
boosted_high_pitched_whine.flavour: *'Eventually it’s the only thing they can focus on.'*

illicit_shifter.name: Illicit Shifter
illicit_shifter.desc: When installed, upgrade 3 random battle cards.
illicit_shifter.flavour: *'One use but you’re going to find yourself moving a lot easier in some areas.'*

boosted_shifter.name: Boosted Shifter
boosted_shifter.desc: When upgraded, upgrade 3 additional battle cards.
boosted_shifter.flavour: *'One use but you’re going to find yourself moving a lot easier in some areas.'*

immaculate_swarm.name: Immaculate Swarm
immaculate_swarm.desc: All cards deal 1 bonus damage per friendly argument.

impulse_jack.name: Impulse Jack
impulse_jack.desc: At the start of every negotiation, **Improvise** a 0 cost card from your deck.
impulse_jack.flavour: *'Keeps your strongest ideas at the forefront for a fair installation price.'*

visionary_impulse_jack.name: Visionary Impulse Jack
visionary_impulse_jack.desc: At the start of every negotiation, **Improvise** 2 0 cost cards from your deck.
visionary_impulse_jack.flavour: *'Keeps your strongest ideas at the forefront for a fair installation price.'*

interior_drill.name: Interior Drill
interior_drill.desc: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 until played.
interior_drill.flavour: *'You probably don't need what it’s getting rid of. Probably.'*

boosted_interior_drill.name: Boosted Interior Drill
boosted_interior_drill.desc: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 2 until played.
boosted_interior_drill.flavour: *'You probably don't need what it’s getting rid of. Probably.'*

jarackle_janglers.name: Jarackle Janglers
jarackle_janglers.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. Your core argument takes 2 damage at the end of your turn.
jarackle_janglers.flavour: *'Those guys do NOT care if you hear them coming. They kind of live for that.'*

visionary_jarackle_janglers.name: Visionary Jarackle Janglers
visionary_jarackle_janglers.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. Your core argument takes 2 damage at the end of your turn.
visionary_jarackle_janglers.flavour: *'Those guys do NOT care if you hear them coming. They kind of live for that.'*

jugularnaut.name: Jugularnaut
jugularnaut.desc: Whenever your damage spills over, apply 2 **Composure** to a random argument.
jugularnaut.flavour: *'Fits just under the jawline, has profound effects on one's delivery.'*

boosted_jugularnaut.name: Boosted Jugularnaut
boosted_jugularnaut.desc: Whenever your damage spills over, apply 3 **Composure** to a random argument.
boosted_jugularnaut.flavour: *'Fits just under the jawline, has profound effects on one's delivery.'*

keenskin.name: Keenskin
keenskin.desc: Gain 2 **Composure** whenever an opponent's argument is destroyed or removed by a card.
keenskin.flavour: *'Heavily electrified epidermal implant. Keenskin has been around forever but not too many people get it installed.*

stone_keenskin.name: Stone Keenskin
stone_keenskin.desc: Gain 4 **Composure** whenever an opponent's argument is destroyed or removed by a card.
stone_keenskin.flavour: *'Heavily electrified epidermal implant. Keenskin has been around forever but not too many people get it installed.*

kickoff.name: Kickoff
kickoff.desc: At the start of each turn, **Gamble**.

mirrored_kickoff.name: Mirrored Kickoff
mirrored_kickoff.desc: At the start of each turn, **Gamble** twice.

klipper.name: Klipper
klipper.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn, lose 15 maximum health when installed.
klipper.flavour: *'Kra'deshi klippers are nasty weapons used by seasoned fighters to speed up the longer combats.'*

visionary_klipper.name: Visionary Klipper
visionary_klipper.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn, lose 15 maximum health when installed.
visionary_klipper.flavour: *'Kra'deshi klippers are nasty weapons used by seasoned fighters to speed up the longer combats.'*

lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning_rod.desc: At the start of each negotiation, insert a Conductor card into your hand that redirects opponent intents.
lightning_rod.flavour: *'Really helps out your personality, they only focus on one of your many flaws.'*

boosted_lightning_rod.name: Boosted Lightning Rod
boosted_lightning_rod.desc: At the start of each negotiation, insert a Super Conductor card into your hand that redirects enemy intents.
boosted_lightning_rod.flavour: *'Really helps out your personality, they only focus on one of your many flaws.'*

locus_breaker.name: Locus Breaker
locus_breaker.desc: Whenever you draw 5 or more cards after your initial hand in a single turn, gain 1 Bait.
locus_breaker.flavour: *'It’s a small change but you get to keep your wits.'*

boosted_locus_breaker.name: Boosted Locus Breaker
boosted_locus_breaker.desc: Whenever you draw 4 or more cards after your initial hand in a single turn, gain 1 Bait.
boosted_locus_breaker.flavour: *'It’s a small change but you get to keep your wits.'*

looper.name: Looper
looper.desc: At the end of your turn, **Alleviate** 2.

soothing_looper.name: Soothing Looper
soothing_looper.desc: At the end of your turn, **Alleviate** 4.

lucky_strike.name: Lucky Strike
lucky_strike.desc: Lower the **Threshold** of the first card you play each turn by 1.
lucky_strike.flavour: *'Keeps you nice and alert for when the time comes.'*

luckier_strike.name: Luckier Strike
luckier_strike.desc: Lower the **Threshold** of all cards by 1.
luckier_strike.flavour: *'Keeps you nice and alert for when the time comes.'*

lumin_relic.name: Lumin Relic
lumin_relic.desc: If you have 5 Renown or more at the start of your turn, draw a card.

visionary_lumin_relic.name: Visionary Lumin Relic
visionary_lumin_relic.desc: If you have 5 Renown or more at the start of your turn, draw 2 cards.

luminjectors.name: Luminjectors
luminjectors.desc: A random friendly argument gains 2 resolve at the beginning of your turn.
luminjectors.flavour: *'Introducing lumin properly into the nervous system affects the willpower of the recipient. Properly being the key word here.'*

boosted_luminjectors.name: Boosted Luminjectors
boosted_luminjectors.desc: A random friendly argument gains 3 resolve at the beginning of your turn.
boosted_luminjectors.flavour: *'Introducing lumin properly into the nervous system affects the willpower of the recipient. Properly being the key word here.'*

macro_rasp.name: Macro Rasp
macro_rasp.desc: Whenever you apply **Bleed**, deal 1 damage to the target.
macro_rasp.flavour: *'Straight from the highest ranking bloodstriker, it's the infamous Macro Rasp!'*

maelstrom_spine.name: Maelstrom Spine
maelstrom_spine.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, deal 4 damage to all enemies.

master_chip.name: Master Chip
master_chip.desc: At the start of each battle, **Improvise** a random item card.
master_chip.flavour: *'There’s a lot of tech in this. Just hope you are packing enough raw material or it could get ugly.'*

boosted_master_chip.name: Boosted Master Chip
boosted_master_chip.desc: At the start of each battle, **Improvise+** a random item card.
boosted_master_chip.flavour: *'There’s a lot of tech in this. Just hope you are packing enough raw material or it could get ugly.'*

memorization_implant.name: Memorization Implant
memorization_implant.desc: At the start of each negotiation, choose a card in your hand and duplicate it.
memorization_implant.flavour: *'Strengthens those opinions and takes away the stress of remembering your stronger points.'*

boosted_memorization_implant.name: Boosted Memorization Implant
boosted_memorization_implant.desc: At the start of each negotiation, choose up to 2 cards in your hand and duplicate them.
boosted_memorization_implant.flavour: *'Strengthens those opinions and takes away the stress of remembering your stronger points.'*

memory_lock.name: Memory Lock
memory_lock.desc: At the start of each turn, **Prepare** a card.
memory_lock.flavour: *'You aren’t going to miss a thing with this little guy imbedded between your hemispheres.'*

visionary_memory_lock.name: Visionary Memory Lock
visionary_memory_lock.desc: At the start of each turn, draw a card, then **Prepare** a card.
visionary_memory_lock.flavour: *'You aren’t going to miss a thing with this little guy imbedded between your hemispheres.'*

merged_glass.name: Merged Glass
merged_glass.desc: **Defense** is halved instead of removed at the start of your turn.

midbrain_padding.name: Midbrain Padding
midbrain_padding.desc: Apply 1 **Composure** on all arguments at the end of your turn.
midbrain_padding.flavour: *'Look, the change of hat size is worth the trouble, trust me.'*

stone_midbrain_padding.name: Stone Midbrain Padding
stone_midbrain_padding.desc: Apply 2 **Composure** on all arguments at the end of your turn.
stone_midbrain_padding.flavour: *'Look, the change of hat size is worth the trouble, trust me.'*

mind_spool.name: Mind Spool
mind_spool.desc: Draw 3 extra cards at the start of every turn. At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for every card in your hand above 3.
mind_spool.flavour: *'A very powerful cognitive accelerant, but one can get extremely carried away and turn into a rambling idiot.'*

visionary_mind_spool.name: Visionary Mind Spool
visionary_mind_spool.desc: Draw 4 extra cards at the start of every turn. At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for every card in your hand above 3.
visionary_mind_spool.flavour: *'A very powerful cognitive accelerant, but one can get extremely carried away and turn into a rambling idiot.'*

muscle_bank.name: Muscle Bank
muscle_bank.desc: Draw 3 extra cards at the start of every turn. At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for every card in your hand above 3.
muscle_bank.flavour: *'You’re going to be sore in the morning.'*

visionary_muscle_bank.name: Visionary Muscle Bank
visionary_muscle_bank.desc: Draw 4 extra cards at the start of every turn. At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for every card in your hand above 3.
visionary_muscle_bank.flavour: *'You’re going to be sore in the morning.'*

myelin_buffer.name: Myelin Buffer
myelin_buffer.flavour: *'It just keeps the membrane a little cooler and more supple.'*

boosted_myelin_buffer.name: Boosted Myelin Buffer
boosted_myelin_buffer.flavour: *'It just keeps the membrane a little cooler and more supple.'*

nailed_glove.name: Nailed Glove
nailed_glove.desc: When receiving damage, you only lose up to 4 Combo.
nailed_glove.flavour: *'Usually used in the Derrick fighting pits, these gloves are inexpensive and have a little extra bite.'*

boosted_nailed_glove.name: Boosted Nailed Glove
boosted_nailed_glove.desc: When receiving damage, you only lose up to 2 Combo.
boosted_nailed_glove.flavour: *'Usually used in the Derrick fighting pits, these gloves are inexpensive and have a little extra bite.'*

defective_neural_braid.name: Defective Neural Braid
defective_neural_braid.desc: At the start of each negotiation, lose resolve equal to the cost of your starting hand.
defective_neural_braid.flavour: *'I think it just needs to get to know you.'*

neural_braid.name: Neural Braid
neural_braid.desc: At the start of each negotiation, restore resolve equal to the cost of your starting hand.
neural_braid.flavour: *'I think it just needs to get to know you.'*

ocular_surrogate.name: Ocular Surrogate
ocular_surrogate.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 4 damage to a random opponent argument.
ocular_surrogate.flavour: *'No, you don’t get to pick the color.'*

boosted_ocular_surrogate.name: Boosted Ocular Surrogate
boosted_ocular_surrogate.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 6 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_ocular_surrogate.flavour: *'No, you don’t get to pick the color.'*

overflow.name: Overflow
overflow.desc: Whenever you deal the maximum damage of a card that has a damage range, draw a card.
overflow.flavour: *'You can’t even feel the kickback, use that space to find another target.'*

visionary_overflow.name: Visionary Overflow
visionary_overflow.desc: Whenever you deal the maximum damage of a card that has a damage range, draw 2 cards.
visionary_overflow.flavour: *'You can’t even feel the kickback, use that space to find another target.'*

parietal_integrator.name: Parietal Integrator
parietal_integrator.desc: At the start of each negotiation, discard up to 2 cards and draw that many new cards.
parietal_integrator.flavour: *'It kind of filters out thoughts that are too distracting. Don’t worry, they probably weren’t too important anyways.'*

boosted_parietal_integrator.name: Boosted Parietal Integrator
boosted_parietal_integrator.desc: At the start of each negotiation, discard up to 4 cards and draw that many new cards.
boosted_parietal_integrator.flavour: *'It kind of filters out thoughts that are too distracting. Don’t worry, they probably weren’t too important anyways.'*

parlous_concept.name: Parlous Concept
parlous_concept.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, **Improvise** a random uncommon or rare card. It costs 1 less.

perpetual_charger.name: Perpetual Charger
perpetual_charger.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 **Overcharge**.

boosted_perpetual_charger.name: Boosted Perpetual Charger
boosted_perpetual_charger.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 2 **Overcharge**.
boosted_perpetual_charger.flavour: *'Ok it’s not perpetual, but it lasts longer than what you are currently using.'*

perpetual_recycler.name: Perpetual Recycler
perpetual_recycler.desc: Whenever you **Expend** a card, draw a card.
perpetual_recycler.flavour: *'No, you can't turn it off. You'll get used to the noise.'*

visionary_perpetual_recycler.name: Visionary Perpetual Recycler
visionary_perpetual_recycler.desc: Whenever you **Expend** a card, draw 2 cards.
visionary_perpetual_recycler.flavour: *'No, you can't turn it off. You'll get used to the noise.'*

pinball.name: Pinball
pinball.desc: At the start of each battle, apply 4 Ricochet to a random target.

boosted_pinball.name: Boosted Pinball
boosted_pinball.desc: At the start of each battle, apply 6 Ricochet to a random target.

piston.name: Piston
piston.desc: Whenever you play 3 attacks in a row, gain 2 **Defense**.
piston.flavour: *'You can probably feel it in your bones because that’s where we put it.'*

stone_piston.name: Stone Piston
stone_piston.desc: Whenever you play 3 attacks in a row, gain 4 **Defense**.
stone_piston.flavour: *'You can probably feel it in your bones because that’s where we put it.'*

pocket_bomb.name: Pocket Bomb
pocket_bomb.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
pocket_bomb.flavour: *'No this is the new model, you have nothing to worry about.'*

boosted_pocket_bomb.name: Boosted Pocket Bomb
boosted_pocket_bomb.desc: Whenever you shuffle your deck, deal 4 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_pocket_bomb.flavour: *'No this is the new model, you have nothing to worry about.'*

pons_mite.name: Pons Mite
pons_mite.desc: Increase the maximum damage of all cards by 1.
pons_mite.flavour: *'You’ll get used to the itchiness. And be sure to drink more water.'*

boosted_pons_mite.name: Boosted Pons Mite
boosted_pons_mite.desc: Increase the maximum damage of all cards by 2.
boosted_pons_mite.flavour: *'You’ll get used to the itchiness. And be sure to drink more water.'*

power_sink.name: Power Sink
power_sink.desc: Whenever you gain **Fully Charged**, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1.
power_sink.flavour: *'Gun cycling takes years of practice, this here shaves off a couple months to get the most from those pistols.'*

boosted_power_sink.name: Boosted Power Sink
boosted_power_sink.desc: Whenever you gain **Fully Charged**, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 2.
boosted_power_sink.flavour: *'Gun cycling takes years of practice, this here shaves off a couple months to get the most from those pistols.'*

predictive_brawling.name: Predictive Brawling
predictive_brawling.desc: Gain 1 Combo at the beginning of your turn.
predictive_brawling.flavour: *'There's just only so many ways somebody can throw a punch.*

rival's_predictive_brawling.name: Rival's Predictive Brawling
rival's_predictive_brawling.desc: Gain 2 Combo at the beginning of your turn.
rival's_predictive_brawling.flavour: *'There's just only so many ways somebody can throw a punch.*

psimulacrum.name: Psimulacrum
psimulacrum.desc: Duplicate the first argument you create every negotiation.
psimulacrum.flavour: *'I’m not too sure if we should be using this metal but it should be fine.'*

enduring_psimulacrum.name: Enduring Psimulacrum

enduring_psimulacrum.flavour: *'I’m not too sure if we should be using this metal but it should be fine.'*

quick_charger.name: Quick Charger
quick_charger.desc: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 until played.
quick_charger.flavour: *'Obvious upgrade from last year’s slow charger.'*

boosted_quick_charger.name: Boosted Quick Charger
boosted_quick_charger.desc: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 2 until played.
boosted_quick_charger.flavour: *'Obvious upgrade from last year’s slow charger.'*

quick_strap.name: Quick Strap
quick_strap.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. Battle card upgrades with multiple upgrades now have 1 option fewer.
quick_strap.flavour: *'A belt with a series of enhancement drug injectors. Seems to really affect the ol' attention span as well.'*

visionary_quick_strap.name: Visionary Quick Strap
visionary_quick_strap.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. Battle card upgrades now have 1 option fewer.
visionary_quick_strap.flavour: *'A belt with a series of enhancement drug injectors. Seems to really affect the ol' attention span as well.'*

razorglass.name: Razorglass
razorglass.desc: Whenever you play an Empty Bottle card, take 2 damage.
razorglass.flavour: *'Extremely fragile and extremely sharp, are you sure you want to be carrying all those around?.'*

softened_razorglass.name: Softened Razorglass
softened_razorglass.desc: Whenever you play an Empty Bottle card, take 1 damage.
softened_razorglass.flavour: *'Extremely fragile and extremely sharp, are you sure you want to be carrying all those around?.'*

rebounder.name: Rebounder
rebounder.desc: The first time your core argument takes damage, ignore the damage and deal that much damage to a random opponent argument.
rebounder.flavour: *'Well, I’m rubber and you’re oshnu glue.'*

boosted_rebounder.name: Boosted Rebounder
boosted_rebounder.desc: The first time your core argument takes damage, ignore the damage and deal that much damage + 3 to a random opponent argument.
boosted_rebounder.flavour: *'Well, I’m rubber and you’re oshnu glue.'*

reckless_idol.name: Reckless Idol
reckless_idol.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn, reduce **Defense** gained from cards by 2.
reckless_idol.flavour: *'Under the pillow every night and you dream real wicked.'*

visionary_reckless_idol.name: Visionary Reckless Idol
visionary_reckless_idol.desc: Gain 1 action and draw 1 card at the start of your turn, reduce **Defense** gained from cards by 2.
visionary_reckless_idol.flavour: *'Under the pillow every night and you dream real wicked.'*

recycler.name: Recycler
recycler.desc: The first time you **Expend** a card each turn, draw a card.
recycler.flavour: *'Previously, all that blood and sweat was just wasted.'*

visionary_recycler.name: Visionary Recycler
visionary_recycler.desc: The first time you **Expend** a card each turn, draw 2 cards.
visionary_recycler.flavour: *'Previously, all that blood and sweat was just wasted.'*

red_bandana.name: Red Bandana
red_bandana.desc: Your allies receive 2 **Power** when they join battle.
red_bandana.flavour: *'Bright and aggressive, unless worn as an ascot.'*

boosted_red_bandana.name: Boosted Red Bandana
boosted_red_bandana.desc: Your allies receive 3 **Power** when they join battle.
boosted_red_bandana.flavour: *'Bright and aggressive, unless worn as an ascot.'*

reflector.name: Reflector
reflector.desc: Whenever you play an Empty Bottle, gain 2 **Defense**.
reflector.flavour: *'A good addition to any bar brawler’s repertoire.'*

stone_reflector.name: Stone Reflector
stone_reflector.desc: Whenever you play an Empty Bottle, gain 3 **Defense**.
stone_reflector.flavour: *'A good addition to any bar brawler’s repertoire.'*

reflexor_heads.name: Reflexor: Heads
reflexor_heads.desc: At the start of each negotiation, Rig 2 .
reflexor_heads.flavour: *'You just have to tilt it a little to the left.'*

boosted_reflexor_heads.name: Boosted Reflexor: Heads
boosted_reflexor_heads.desc: At the start of each negotiation, Rig 4 .
boosted_reflexor_heads.flavour: *'You just have to tilt it a little to the left.'*

reflexor_snails.name: Reflexor: Snails
reflexor_snails.desc: At the start of each negotiation, Rig 2 .
reflexor_snails.flavour: *'You just have to tilt it a little to the right.'*

boosted_reflexor_snails.name: Boosted Reflexor: Snails
boosted_reflexor_snails.desc: At the start of each negotiation, Rig 4 .
boosted_reflexor_snails.flavour: *'You just have to tilt it a little to the right.'*

reinforcer.name: Reinforcer
reinforcer.desc: Whenever you draw a card after your initial hand, apply 1 **Composure** to a random argument.

stone_reinforcer.name: Stone Reinforcer
stone_reinforcer.desc: Whenever you draw a card after your initial hand, apply 2 **Composure** to a random argument.

rejig.name: Rejig
rejig.desc: At the start of each battle, discard up to 2 cards and draw that many new cards.

wide_rejig.name: Wide Rejig
wide_rejig.desc: At the start of each battle, discard up to 4 cards and draw that many new cards.

resolute_signet.name: Resolute Signet
resolute_signet.desc: Whenever you deal damage to your own arguments, apply 2 **Composure** to your core argument.
resolute_signet.flavour: *A simple signet ring that was used to seal important documents. Now it is a symbol of lineage and status.'*

stone_resolute_signet.name: Stone Resolute Signet
stone_resolute_signet.desc: Whenever you deal damage to your own arguments, apply 3 **Composure** to your core argument.
stone_resolute_signet.flavour: *A simple signet ring that was used to seal important documents. Now it is a symbol of lineage and status.'*

robustify.name: Robustify
robustify.flavour: *'Always good to have a spare cybernetic organ, right?'*

boosted_robustify.name: Boosted Robustify
boosted_robustify.flavour: *'Always good to have a spare cybernetic organ, right?'*

roller_drum.name: Roller Drum
roller_drum.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. All Hostility cards deal 50% less damage.
roller_drum.flavour: *'It’s very zen, so you’ll be too calm to come off all that fierce.'*

visionary_roller_drum.name: Visionary Roller Drum
visionary_roller_drum.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. All Hostility cards deal 50% less damage.
visionary_roller_drum.flavour: *'It’s very zen, so you’ll be too calm to come off all that fierce.'*

rugged_wiring.name: Rugged Wiring
rugged_wiring.desc: Gain 2 **Power** at the start of each battle. Lose 2 **Power** the first time you take enemy damage.
rugged_wiring.flavour: *'Mine haven’t given me any problems in days.'*

boosted_rugged_wiring.name: Boosted Rugged Wiring
boosted_rugged_wiring.desc: Gain 4 **Power** at the start of each battle. Lose 4 **Power** the first time you take enemy damage.
boosted_rugged_wiring.flavour: *'Mine haven’t given me any problems in days.'*

sage_conversion.name: Sage Conversion
sage_conversion.desc: At the start of battle, gain health equal to your current resolve.
sage_conversion.flavour: *'Linked directly into the brain stem this is an exciting addition to anyone's cybernetic load out!'*

salvager.name: Salvager
salvager.desc: If you discarded at least 4 cards on your previous turn, gain 3 **Temporary Power**.
salvager.flavour: *'Always important to shrink that carbon footprint.'*

boosted_salvager.name: Boosted Salvager
boosted_salvager.desc: If you discarded at least 4 cards on your previous turn, gain 4 **Temporary Power**.
boosted_salvager.flavour: *'Always important to shrink that carbon footprint.'*

scan_code.name: Scan Code
scan_code.desc: At the start of each battle, apply 3 Scanned to a random enemy.

wide_scan_code.name: Wide Scan Code
wide_scan_code.desc: At the start of each battle, apply 3 Scanned to 2 random enemies.

scatterbrain.name: Scatterbrain
scatterbrain.desc: At the end of your turn, deal damage to a random opponent argument equal to the total number of friendly arguments.
scatterbrain.flavour: *'It actually helps you keep track of all those topics you started.'*

boosted_scatterbrain.name: Boosted Scatterbrain
boosted_scatterbrain.desc: At the end of your turn, deal damage to a random opponent argument equal to the total number of friendly arguments +2.
boosted_scatterbrain.flavour: *'It actually helps you keep track of all those topics you started.'*

scattershot.name: Scattershot
scattershot.desc: Deal 2 bonus damage to targets with Ricochet.
scattershot.flavour: *'It might be a couple micrometers under legal size for something this dangerous but at least it’s easy to hide.'*

boosted_scattershot.name: Boosted Scattershot
boosted_scattershot.desc: Deal 3 bonus damage to targets with Ricochet.
boosted_scattershot.flavour: *'It might be a couple micrometers under legal size for something this dangerous but at least it’s easy to hide.'*

scholars_clip.name: Scholar's Clip
scholars_clip.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. At the start of every turn remove 1 Influence and 1 Dominance.
scholars_clip.flavour: *'The constant cramping in your trapezius is just one of the many side effects!'*

visionary_scholars_clip.name: Visionary Scholar's Clip
visionary_scholars_clip.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. At the start of every turn remove 1 Influence and 1 Dominance.
visionary_scholars_clip.flavour: *'The constant cramping in your trapezius is just one of the many side effects!'*

second_opinion.name: Second Opinion
second_opinion.desc: Increase the minimum damage by 2 on your attacks against targets that have Trauma or Traumatized.

boosted_second_opinion.name: Boosted Second Opinion
boosted_second_opinion.desc: Increase the minimum damage by 3 on your attacks against targets that have Trauma or Traumatized.

serrated_edge.name: Serrated Edge
serrated_edge.flavour: *'I didn't think this thing could get through a shroke's hide, sometimes I surprise myself.'*

boosted_serrated_edge.name: Boosted Serrated Edge
boosted_serrated_edge.desc: **Wound** is twice as effective and **Impair** reduces damage by 50%.
boosted_serrated_edge.flavour: *'I didn't think this thing could get through a shroke's hide, sometimes I surprise myself.'*

shatterguard.name: Shatterguard
shatterguard.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 1 **Defense** for every Empty Bottle in your hand.
shatterguard.flavour: *'Transforming your evenings out into solid defenses.'*

stone_shatterguard.name: Stone Shatterguard
stone_shatterguard.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 2 **Defense** for every Empty Bottle in your hand.
stone_shatterguard.flavour: *'Transforming your evenings out into solid defenses.'*

shell.name: Shell
shell.desc: If you are outnumbered, gain 4 **Defense** and 3 Counter at the end of your turn.

thorny_shell.name: Thorny Shell
thorny_shell.desc: If you are outnumbered, gain 6 **Defense** and 4 Counter at the end of your turn.

shrieker.name: Shrieker
shrieker.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all opponent arguments.
shrieker.flavour: *'Don’t worry, where it’s going you won’t be able to see any of it.'*

boosted_shrieker.name: Boosted Shrieker
boosted_shrieker.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to all opponent arguments.
boosted_shrieker.flavour: *'Don’t worry, where it’s going you won’t be able to see any of it.'*

shrokian_glamour_stones.name: Shrokian Glamour Stones
shrokian_glamour_stones.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn, bystanders and pets no longer assist you in negotiations.
shrokian_glamour_stones.flavour: *'Impressive to those rough-skinned shrokes but just absolute Hesh on your posture.'*

visionary_glamour_stones.name: Visionary Glamour Stones
visionary_glamour_stones.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn, bystanders and pets no longer assist you in negotiations.
visionary_glamour_stones.flavour: *'Impressive to those rough-skinned shrokes but just absolute Hesh on your posture.'*

shuffle_step.name: Shuffle Step
shuffle_step.desc: Whenever you **Improvise** a maneuver card, gain 2 **Defense**.
shuffle_step.flavour: *'Keeps you a little quicker on your feet.'*

stone_shuffle_step.name: Stone Shuffle Step
stone_shuffle_step.desc: Whenever you **Improvise** a maneuver card, gain 3 **Defense**.
stone_shuffle_step.flavour: *'Keeps you a little quicker on your feet.'*

silver_tongue.name: Silver Tongue
silver_tongue.desc: Diplomacy cards deal 2 bonus damage while you have any Influence.

boosted_silver_tongue.name: Boosted Silver Tongue
boosted_silver_tongue.desc: Diplomacy cards deal 3 bonus damage while you have any Influence.

skeletal_suspension.name: Skeletal Suspension
skeletal_suspension.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to half of your Combo.
skeletal_suspension.flavour: *'It runs along the femur, your opponent is going to feel it more than you are.*

stone_skeletal_suspension.name: Stone Skeletal Suspension
stone_skeletal_suspension.desc: At the end of your turn, gain **Defense** equal to 75% of your Combo.
stone_skeletal_suspension.flavour: *'It runs along the femur, your opponent is going to feel it more than you are.*

slider.name: Slider
slider.desc: At the start of every 3rd turn, **Improvise** a card from your draw pile.
slider.flavour: *'These take a bit of time to acclimatize to the user but the results are always impressive.'*

boosted_slider.name: Boosted Slider
boosted_slider.desc: At the start of every 2nd turn, **Improvise** a card from your draw pile.
boosted_slider.flavour: *'These take a bit of time to acclimatize to the user but the results are always impressive.'*

slug_nook.name: Slug Nook
slug_nook.desc: The first time you **Gamble** and get Snails, a random card in your hand costs 1 less until the end of your turn. Resets at the start of your turn.
slug_nook.flavour: *'It’s subtle but the coins landing sure feels good in your hand doesn’t it?'*

boosted_slug_nook.name: Boosted Slug Nook
boosted_slug_nook.desc: The first time you **Gamble** and get Snails, a random card in your hand costs 2 less until the end of your turn. Resets at the start of your turn.
boosted_slug_nook.flavour: *'It’s subtle but the coins landing sure feels good in your hand doesn’t it?'*

snap_talon.name: Snap Talon
snap_talon.desc: Your attacks deal 2 bonus damage to targets with **Bleed**.
snap_talon.flavour: *'A hybrid technology that incorporates the claws of a Vroc with laser sharpening.'*

boosted_snap_talon.name: Boosted Snap Talon
boosted_snap_talon.desc: Your attacks deal 3 bonus damage to targets with **Bleed**.
boosted_snap_talon.flavour: *'A hybrid technology that incorporates the claws of a Vroc with laser sharpening.'*

spare_magazine.name: Spare Magazine
spare_magazine.desc: Whenever you gain **Fully Charged**, gain 2 **Temporary Power**.
spare_magazine.flavour: *'I always make sure to bring it to the bathroom.'*

boosted_spare_magazine.name: Boosted Spare Magazine
boosted_spare_magazine.desc: Whenever you gain **Fully Charged**, gain 3 **Temporary Power**.
boosted_spare_magazine.flavour: *'I always make sure to bring it to the bathroom.'*

speed_shot.name: Speed Shot
speed_shot.desc: At the start of every turn, insert Lean and Green into your hand.
speed_shot.flavour: *'Always have your favorite spirits at the ready with this handy device!'*

boosted_speed_shot.name: Boosted Speed Shot
boosted_speed_shot.desc: At the start of every turn, insert Boosted Lean and Green into your hand.
boosted_speed_shot.flavour: *'Always have your favorite spirits at the ready with this handy device!'*

speed_wheel.name: Speed Wheel
speed_wheel.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 **Charge**.
speed_wheel.flavour: *'This here keeps those cells charged at a rate faster than even you could cycle.'*

inductive_speed_wheel.name: Inductive Speed Wheel
inductive_speed_wheel.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 2 **Charge**.
inductive_speed_wheel.flavour: *'This here keeps those cells charged at a rate faster than even you could cycle.'*

splintershot.name: Splintershot
splintershot.desc: Whenever you spend your last **Charge**, apply 2 **Wound** to a random enemy.
splintershot.flavour: *'Alright now these rounds need to be fired at the right cycle or else they’ll split your barrel right apart.'*

deep_splintershot.name: Deep Splintershot
deep_splintershot.desc: Whenever you spend your last **Charge**, apply 3 **Wound** to a random enemy.
deep_splintershot.flavour: *'Alright now these rounds need to be fired at the right cycle or else they’ll split your barrel right apart.'*

stinger.name: Stinger
stinger.desc: Whenever you discard a card, deal 2 damage to a random opponent argument.
stinger.flavour: *'For those who love making strong points.'*

boosted_stinger.name: Boosted Stinger
boosted_stinger.desc: Whenever you discard a card, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_stinger.flavour: *'For those who love making strong points.'*

study_guide.name: Study Guide
study_guide.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Concentration.
study_guide.flavour: *'This will keep you focused on the task at hand.'*

boosted_study_guide.name: Boosted Study Guide
boosted_study_guide.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 3 Concentration.
boosted_study_guide.flavour: *'This will keep you focused on the task at hand.'*

swamp_haunt.name: Swamp Haunt
swamp_haunt.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. Gain a random negotiation parasite.
swamp_haunt.flavour: *'Crawling through your ear canal, and moving through your mind. The spined and twisting claw-backed worm, will leave your cares behind.'*

visionary_swamp_haunt.name: Visionary Swamp Haunt
visionary_swamp_haunt.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. Gain a random negotiation parasite.
visionary_swamp_haunt.flavour: *'Crawling through your ear canal, and moving through your mind. The spined and twisting claw-backed worm, will leave your cares behind.'*

synapse_board.name: Synapse Board
synapse_board.desc: Whenever you **Improvise** an attack card, gain 2 **Temporary Power**.
synapse_board.flavour: *'I don’t know where those attacks were coming from, it was like fighting three people at once.'*

boosted_synapse_board.name: Boosted Synapse Board
boosted_synapse_board.desc: Whenever you **Improvise** an attack card, gain 3 **Temporary Power**.
boosted_synapse_board.flavour: *'I don’t know where those attacks were coming from, it was like fighting three people at once.'*

temporal_wire.name: Temporal Wire
temporal_wire.flavour: *'Gives you a bit of space when concentrating, feels a little like you are cheating time.'*

boosted_temporal_wire.name: Boosted Temporal Wire
boosted_temporal_wire.flavour: *'Gives you a bit of space when concentrating, feels a little like you are cheating time.'*

the_red.name: The Red
the_red.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. All Diplomacy cards deal 50% less damage.
the_red.flavour: *'Surprisingly delicious while being low in sugar and rage inducing.'*

the_visionary_red.name: The Visionary Red
the_visionary_red.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. All Diplomacy cards deal 50% less damage.
the_visionary_red.flavour: *'Surprisingly delicious while being low in sugar and rage inducing.'*

the_spider.name: The Spider
the_spider.desc: After every 8th card played, gain 2 **Temporary Power**.
the_spider.flavour: *'Just come back in a week so I can make sure it’s still healthy.'*

the_boosted_spider.name: The Boosted Spider
the_boosted_spider.desc: After every 8th card played, gain 3 **Temporary Power**.
the_boosted_spider.flavour: *'Just come back in a week so I can make sure it’s still healthy.'*

thought_reverser.name: Thought Reverser
thought_reverser.desc: Every turn, the first card you draw after your initial hand is **Prepared**.
thought_reverser.flavour: *'Changing your mind comes really naturally with this here. Makes you maintain that level of confidence.'*

boosted_thought_reverser.name: Boosted Thought Reverser
boosted_thought_reverser.desc: Every turn, the first two cards you draw after your initial hand are **Prepared**.
boosted_thought_reverser.flavour: *'Changing your mind comes really naturally with this here. Makes you maintain that level of confidence.'*

three_fingers.name: Three Fingers
three_fingers.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. When installed, 2 random people will hate you.

visionary_three_fingers.name: Visionary Three Fingers
visionary_three_fingers.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. When installed, 2 random people will hate you.

tomb_relic.name: Tomb Relic
tomb_relic.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 action for every 6 cards in your discard pile.

torrid_clone.name: Torrid Clone
torrid_clone.desc: The first card you play each turn is played twice.

totem.name: Totem
totem.desc: While you have Concentration, all cards gain 2 maximum damage.
totem.flavour: *'Rook! I didn’t know you were superstitious!.'*

boosted_totem.name: Boosted Totem
boosted_totem.desc: While you have Concentration, all cards gain 3 maximum damage.
boosted_totem.flavour: *'Rook! I didn’t know you were superstitious!.'*

trench_knife.name: Trench Knife
trench_knife.desc: At the end of each turn, gain 4 **Defense** and 3 Counter if all your cells are empty.
trench_knife.flavour: *'A brutal relic from the old wars, still sharp and mean.'*

stone_trench_knife.name: Stone Trench Knife
stone_trench_knife.desc: At the end of each turn, gain 6 **Defense** and 3 Counter if all your cells are empty.
stone_trench_knife.flavour: *'A brutal relic from the old wars, still sharp and mean.'*

truncheon.name: Truncheon
truncheon.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. **Bleed** you apply is removed completely instead of being halved.
truncheon.flavour: *'A relic from a simpler time. There’s only a couple ways to use the thing.'*

visionary_truncheon.name: Visionary Truncheon
visionary_truncheon.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn, **Bleed** you apply is removed completely instead of being halved.
visionary_truncheon.flavour: *'A relic from a simpler time. There’s only a couple ways to use the thing.'*

tumbler.name: Tumbler
tumbler.desc: Whenever you **Prepare** a card, deal 2 damage to a random opponent argument.
tumbler.flavour: *'It’s a consistent vibration that keeps your stronger points resonating at a higher frequency.'*

boosted_tumbler.name: Boosted Tumbler
boosted_tumbler.desc: Whenever you **Prepare** a card, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_tumbler.flavour: *'It’s a consistent vibration that keeps your stronger points resonating at a higher frequency.'*

twinned_conquest.name: Twinned Conquest
twinned_conquest.desc: Duplicate the first argument you create each turn.

twinshot.name: Twinshot
twinshot.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 2 **Charge**.
twinshot.flavour: *'First thing in the morning, shower, shave, and load your twinshot.'*

boosted_twinshot.name: Boosted Twinshot
boosted_twinshot.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 3 **Charge**.
boosted_twinshot.flavour: *'First thing in the morning, shower, shave, and load your twinshot.'*

two_fisted.name: Two Fisted
two_fisted.desc: At the start of battle, add 2 Empty Bottle cards to your discard pile.
two_fisted.flavour: *'What can I say, there was a sale on.'*

double_two_fisted.name: Double Two Fisted
double_two_fisted.desc: At the start of battle, add 4 Empty Bottle cards to your discard pile.
double_two_fisted.flavour: *'What can I say, there was a sale on.'*

un_marked_weapons.name: Un-Marked Weapons
un_marked_weapons.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of your turn. You no longer gain **Defense** from empty cells.
un_marked_weapons.flavour: *'Look, I don’t want to tell you what to do or anything, but do NOT let the Admiralty catch you with these.'*

visionary_un_marked_weapons.name: Visionary Un-Marked Weapons
visionary_un_marked_weapons.desc: Gain 1 action and draw a card at the start of your turn. You no longer gain **Defense** from empty cells.
visionary_un_marked_weapons.flavour: *'Look, I don’t want to tell you what to do or anything, but do NOT let the Admiralty catch you with these.'*

unstable_augmentation.name: Unstable Augmentation
unstable_augmentation.desc: Gain 3 **Temporary Power** on the 3rd, 6th and 9th turns of battle.
unstable_augmentation.flavour: *'Take two quarter-doses three times daily, how many times do I have to tell you?''*

boosted_unstable_augmentation.name: Boosted Unstable Augmentation
boosted_unstable_augmentation.desc: Gain 5 **Temporary Power** on the 3rd, 6th and 9th turn of battle.
boosted_unstable_augmentation.flavour: *'Take two quarter-doses three times daily, how many times do I have to tell you?''*

veteran's_wire.name: Veteran's Wire
veteran's_wire.desc: Whenever you add a card to your deck, it is immediately upgraded. (chosen randomly)

void_chain.name: Void Chain
void_chain.desc: At the start of each battle, a random creature joins your team for the duration of the battle.

warding_trinket.name: Warding Trinket
warding_trinket.desc: Whenever you **Gamble**, apply 1 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.
warding_trinket.flavour: *'As long as they are looking where they can, they aren’t looking where they should.'*

boosted_warding_trinket.name: Boosted Warding Trinket
boosted_warding_trinket.desc: Whenever you **Gamble**, apply 1 **Composure** to 2 random friendly arguments.
boosted_warding_trinket.flavour: *'As long as they are looking where they can, they aren’t looking where they should.'*

wounding_barbs.name: Wounding Barbs
wounding_barbs.desc: Your first attack each battle applies 3 **Wound**.

deep_wounding_barbs.name: Deep Wounding Barbs
deep_wounding_barbs.desc: Your first attack each battle applies 4 **Wound**.

wraith_needle.name: Wraith Needle
wraith_needle.desc: Whenever you **Expend** a card, **Improvise** a random uncommon or rare card.

wreckrider_badge.name: Wreckrider Badge
wreckrider_badge.desc: Whenever a friendly argument is destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random opponent argument.
wreckrider_badge.flavour: *I earned mine from almost jumping the Riptide Ravine. It’s more about guts I guess.'*

boosted_wreckrider_badge.name: Boosted Wreckrider Badge
boosted_wreckrider_badge.desc: Whenever a friendly argument is destroyed, deal 3 damage to a random opponent argument.
boosted_wreckrider_badge.flavour: *I earned mine from almost jumping the Riptide Ravine. It’s more about guts I guess.'*

wretched_jar.name: Wretched Jar
wretched_jar.desc: Whenever you draw 6 or more cards after your initial hand in a single turn, play a random card in your hand with a random target.
wretched_jar.flavour: *'Just don’t ask where I found it.'*

boosted_wretched_jar.name: Boosted Wretched Jar
boosted_wretched_jar.desc: Whenever you draw 5 or more cards after your initial hand in a single turn, play a random card in your hand with a random target.
boosted_wretched_jar.flavour: *'Just don’t ask where I found it.'*
